name: Life of a Dwarf Hikikomori
description:
A very simple solo project for my first game jam, DWARF HIKIKOMORI tasks you with helping a dwarf get through their week of performing tasks such as POST on the Internet, SLEEP the fatigue away, PLAY with their unpredictable cat and FIGHT the encroaching Magmakin who covet their anime figurine collection.

Be sure not to accumulate too much FATIGUE or FOMO, or it's game over! There are five endings: four from filling up each of the four bars, and one for doing so after making it past Day 7. Can YOU make it? (Probably, yes.) Expected playtime is about 5-10 minutes.

This is nothing spectacular, but I hope it makes you smile!

Made for Mini Jam 57: Underground

Code and MS Paint art by Fredison

BGM is Lantern Music by A. A. Aalto, licensed under a Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 International License

The one sound effect is from https://opengameart.org/content/512-sound-effects-8-bit-style

Special thanks to SlickRamen for lending a hand when GameMaker pulled a nasty trick on me
